alert.note: Alert for Barry (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:24PM EST until February 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Barry county. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change over to freezing rain, then sleet and snow by daybreak on Thursday, making roads slippery for the morning commute. There will be a break before the snow returns in the afternoon with snow-covered roads expected by the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
